import React,{useState} from 'react' export default function AddUser() { const[users,setUsers]=useState({ fname:'', lname:'', email:'', password:'' }) const{fname,lname,email,password}=users; const onchanges=e=>{ setUsers({...users,[e.target.name]:e.target.value})} return (

onchanges(e)} type="text" className="form-control" placeholder="Enter Your First Name" />
) }
